plain: Most likely, the user enjoys science fiction and fantasy movies. They enjoy complex plots, and are not deterred by long runtimes. They enjoy a variety of musical scores, but tend to enjoy darker, more serious moods. They enjoy a variety of visual styles, but tend to enjoy more realistic settings. They enjoy a variety of writing styles, but tend to enjoy more complex, multi-dimensional characters. They enjoy a variety of themes, but tend to enjoy movies that challenge their perspectives.
